name: Creepcamv1
tagline: Creepcam Version 1.1B5 Original Source. Courtesy of Jeff Preshing
body:
### ## **==========**
### ## **CreepcamV1**
### ## **==========**

**# ###################################################################**
**# Creepcam Version 1.1B5 Original Source. Courtesy of Jeff Preshing.**
**# ###################################################################**

-- Probably the best overall chasecam made for Quake. Focuses on (2) clients not just one, has autoswitch function.
   
Source code for original Creepcam chase cam used in Quake. Embedded in original progs.dat type structure.
Compiles with some warnings in compiler, most are easily fixed. Further Installation instructions hopefully to follow here soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
